title: Access to C(sp3) borylated and silylated cyclic molecules: hydrogenation of corresponding arenes and heteroarenes
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,10590-10607
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00491D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Arzoo Chhabra, Sabrina Reich, Timothy M. Shannon, Robert E. Maleczka, Milton R. Smith
Readily available and bench stable catalyst. Tolerates a variety of functional groups including orthogonal functionality. Circumvents the limitations of sp3 C–H borylation.
